org.openflow.protocol
Enum Wildcards.Flag

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Wildcards.Flag>
      org.openflow.protocol.Wildcards.Flag
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Wildcards.Flag>
Enclosing class:
Wildcards
public static enum Wildcards.Flag
extends java.lang.Enum<Wildcards.Flag>

enum type for the binary flags that can be set in the wildcards field of an OFMatch. Replaces the unwieldy c-ish int constants in OFMatch.

matchOn

int matchOn(int flags)
Returns:
a modified OF-1.0 flags field with this flag cleared (match on this field)

wildcard

int wildcard(int flags)
Returns:
a modified OF-1.0 flags field with this flag set (wildcard this field)

isBolean

boolean isBolean()
Returns:
true iff this is a true boolean flag that can either be off or on.True in OF-1.0 for all fields except NW_SRC and NW_DST

isPartiallyOn

boolean isPartiallyOn(int flags)
Returns:
true iff this wildcard field is currently 'partially on'. Always false for true Boolean Flags. Can be true in OF-1.0 for NW_SRC, NW_DST.

isFullyOn

boolean isFullyOn(int flags)
Parameters:
flags -
Returns:
true iff this wildcard field currently fully on (fully wildcarded). Equivalent to the boolean flag being set in the bitmask for bit flags, and to the wildcarded bit length set to >=32 for NW_SRC and NW_DST

setInt

int setInt(int flags,
           int srcMask)
set the integer representation of this flag. only for NW_SRC and NW_DST

getInt

int getInt(int flags)
set the integer representation of this flag. only for NW_SRC and NW_DST
